title: Milk Punch
full_text:
Milk Punch
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 cocktail
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ounce
brandy
(or bourbon)
1
ounce
dark rum
(or bourbon)
1
teaspoon
sugar
2
dashes
vanilla extract
(optional)
4 to 6
ounces
whole milk
, to taste
Directions
Stir well with ice and strain into a large goblet over fresh crushed ice (or, pour everything into a mug and add hot milk). Sprinkle with nutmeg.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass, cocktail strainer
Whiskey
Brandy & Cognac
Rum
